title: 04/15/2021 - HOUR 1 - Browns, Lawrence, Fields, Nets
itunes:title: 04/15/2021 - HOUR 1 - Browns, Lawrence, Fields, Nets
description:
With all the talent the Browns have, they should win at least 13 games

You don't always need to have a chip on your shoulder

Colin's thoughts on Justin Fields getting the most criticism of the QB class

The Nets might be like the Clippers from last season


Guest: LaVar Arrington
